asgiref.testing

Classes

ApplicationCommunicator

Runs an ASGI application in a test mode, allowing sending of

Module Contents

class asgiref.testing.ApplicationCommunicator(application, scope)[source]

Runs an ASGI application in a test mode, allowing sending of messages to it and retrieval of messages it sends.

application[source]
scope[source]
input_queue[source]
output_queue[source]
future[source]
async wait(timeout=1)[source]

Waits for the application to stop itself and returns any exceptions.

stop(exceptions=True)[source]
async send_input(message)[source]

Sends a single message to the application

async receive_output(timeout=1)[source]

Receives a single message from the application, with optional timeout.

async receive_nothing(timeout=0.1, interval=0.01)[source]

Checks that there is no message to receive in the given time.
